verses.text: \w This|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Hosea|strong="H1954"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Beeri \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w*, \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w*, Ahaz, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jehoash,\f + \fr 1:1 \ft Hebrew Joash, a variant of Jehoash\f* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w first|strong="H8462"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w through|strong="H3212"\w* \w Hosea|strong="H1954"\w*, \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H3947"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prostitute|strong="H2181"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w wife|strong="H1696"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H3206"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w adultery|strong="H2181"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H1696"\w* land \w is|strong="H3068"\w* flagrantly prostituting itself \w by|strong="H3068"\w* departing \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* Hosea \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w married|strong="H3947"\w* \w Gomer|strong="H1586"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Diblaim|strong="H1691"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* she \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Hosea|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w Name|strong="H8034"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*,\f + \fr 1:4 \ft Jezreel means God sows; also in verse 11.\f* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w soon|strong="H4592"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H6485"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bloodshed|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H7673"\w* \w an|strong="H7673"\w* \w end|strong="H7673"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4468"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w break|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w Valley|strong="H6010"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.”

Gomer \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Hosea|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w Name|strong="H8034"\w* \w her|strong="H5375"\w* \w Lo-ruhamah|strong="H3819"\w*,\f + \fr 1:6 \ft Lo-ruhamah means she has not received mercy.\f* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w compassion|strong="H7355"\w* \w on|strong="H7355"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w ever|strong="H3808"\w* \w forgive|strong="H5375"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w compassion|strong="H7355"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w them|strong="H3068"\w*—\w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w cavalry|strong="H6571"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.”

After she \w had|strong="H3205"\w* \w weaned|strong="H1580"\w* \w Lo-ruhamah|strong="H3819"\w*, Gomer \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w Name|strong="H8034"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w Lo-ammi|strong="H3818"\w*,\f + \fr 1:9 \ft Lo-ammi means not My people.\f* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w My|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*.\f + \fr 1:9 \ft Hebrew I am not yours\f*

Yet the number of the Israelites will be like the sand of the sea, which cannot be measured or counted. And it will happen that in the very place where it was said to them, ‘You are not My people,’ they will be called ‘sons of the living God.’\f + \fr 1:10 \ft Cited in Romans 9:26\f*
Then the people of Judah and of Israel will be gathered together, and they will appoint for themselves one leader, and will go up out of the land. For great will be the day of Jezreel.
